channel.title: Giving admin spot 4 help!
channel.description:
If someone helps me with the following questions i will give them a madin spot on xelescape.no-ip.org
1. When i try to make an npc say if im online, the npc is there but not talking? Why? 2. Im using DMCscape, where do i put a tele command? 3. When i try to get a new source, it keeps saying Loading-Please Wait. on the screen. My friends can get on, but i cant. 4. I need help setting up a no-ip server.I think im ready for port fowarding.

item.title: Giving admin spot 4 help!
item.dc:creator: @Xelerate Xelerate
item.description:
@Xelerate wrote:

If someone helps me with the following questions i will give them a madin spot on xelescape.no-ip.org

  1. When i try to make an npc say if im online, the npc is there but not talking? Why?
  2. Im using DMCscape, where do i put a tele command?
  3. When i try to get a new source, it keeps saying Loading-Please Wait. on the screen. My friends can get on, but i cant.
  4. I need help setting up a no-ip server.I think im ready for port fowarding.
